name: Sygnea
description: A simple, modern, dark-mode webapp that generates clean email signatures from minimal inputs. Users can preview in real time, choose a template, and copy/export their signature.

core.name: Template Picker
details: Dummy data pre-inserted so users see designs immediately

core.name: Live Preview
details: Signature updates instantly as user edits inputs
Dark mode default with clean modern design

ui.style: Dark mode by default (no light mode yet)
design: Minimalist UI with soft cards or glassmorphism

optional: Node/Express if you add user accounts or saved signatures

mvp_scope: Keep it simple: single-page app with inputs on the left, live preview + template selector on the right, export buttons at the bottom.
